channel.title: iDigital

item.title: Meta unveils AI tools to give robots a human touch in physical world
item.description: Meta unveils three tools and benchmarks to enhance robot touch perception, dexterity, and human-robot collaboration in real-world settings.

item.title: DevRev raises $100.8 million in Series A funding and becomes an AI unicorn at a $1.15 billion valuation
item.description: Following its successful Series A funding, DevRev drives forward its mission to revolutionize customer support and product development.

item.title: Why multi-agent AI tackles complexities LLMs can’t
item.description: While AGI and fully autonomous systems are still on the horizon, multi-agents will bridge the current gap between LLMs and AGI.

item.title: ‘I don’t want to stop her from moving on with her life’: My second wife is younger than me. If I die first, how do I make sure she doesn’t cut off my children?
item.description: “Is there a way to protect everybody’s interests?”

item.title: Robotics investments top $3.7B in September

item.title: ‘I know it’s awkward to give advice to wealthy people’: My wife, 50, has terminal cancer. Our estate is worth $18 million. How do we prepare?
item.description: “We have two children ages 19 and 21, with one starting law school and the younger planning on medical school.”

item.title: Trump election odds tumble on betting markets after Iowa poll shows Harris lead
item.description: Harris is now the favorite on betting site Predictit.

item.description: AI investment continues to show resiliency, driving deal volumes to 1,245 in Q3, 24, a level not seen since Q1, 22.

item.title: ‘I believe she made a big mistake’: My wife put her paycheck into a bank account with her inheritance. Do I now own 50% of those funds?
item.description: “I’m still working, and we’ve always filed joint tax returns.”

item.title: ‘I feel slighted’: My husband and I are in our 70s. We married 3 years ago. He’s leaving his $1.8 million home to a 10-year-old relative. Is that normal?
item.description: ‘I have almost double his pension income, as his former wives took a considerable share’
